name: Jolyon Palmer
introduction: Jolyon Carlyle Palmer (born 20 January 1991) is a British Formula One driver who formerly drove for Renault from 2016 to 2017. He won the 2014 GP2 Series championship by 47 points, a result which earned him his testing role with Lotus for 2015.[1] Jolyon is the son of former F1 driver/commentator Jonathan Palmer.
